MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH41 postcode area of Birkenhead affecting properties in Beckwith Street, Duke Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.45AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:25AM on 22nd February 2021.
